name: Atomic Adam: Episode 1
description: Rock star turned superhero, Atomic Adam is tasked with finding mayor Lamowitz's kidnapped wife before Delta City falls in to the hands of Deathbot. Do you have what it takes to save Delta City?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.0ghz or higher Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
